summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue from East 56th Street to East 58th Street et al in the City of Seattle, by grading & curbing same under Ordinance No. 15788, creating Local Improvement District No. 1467 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
